verses.verse: And on the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> there was a <S%G1062>wedding<s%> in <S%G2580>Cana<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> and the <S%G3384>mother<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G1563>there;<s%>
and <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> was <S%G2564>invited,<s%> and His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> to the <S%G1062>wedding.<s%>
And when the <S%G3631>wine<s%> <S%G5302>gave<s%> out, the <S%G3384>mother<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, "They <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3631>wine.<s%>"
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to her, <S%G1135>"Woman,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> do I have to do with you? My <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G2240>has<s%> not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G2240>come.<s%>"
His <S%G3384>mother<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G1249>servants,<s%> <S%G3739>"Whatever<s%> <S%G5100><s%> <S%G302><s%> He <S%G3004>says<s%> to you, <S%G4160>do<s%> it."

<S%G1161>Now<s%> there were <S%G1803>six<s%> <S%G3035>stone<s%> <S%G5201>waterpots<s%> <S%G2749>set<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> for the <S%G2453>Jewish<s%> custom of <S%G2512>purification,<s%> <S%G5562>containing<s%> <S%G1417>twenty<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5140>thirty<s%> <S%G3355>gallons<s%> <S%G303>each.<s%>
<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G1072>"Fill<s%> the <S%G5201>waterpots<s%> with <S%G5204>water.<s%>" And they <S%G1072>filled<s%> them up to the <S%G507>brim.<s%>
And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G501>"Draw<s%> [some] out <S%G3568>now,<s%> and <S%G5342>take<s%> it to the <S%G755>headwaiter.<s%>" And they <S%G5342>took<s%> it [to him.]

And <S%G5613>when<s%> the <S%G755>headwaiter<s%> <S%G1089>tasted<s%> the <S%G5204>water<s%> which had <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G3631>wine,<s%> and did not <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G4159>where<s%> it <S%G1510>came<s%> from (but the <S%G1249>servants<s%> who had <S%G501>drawn<s%> the <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G3609>knew<s%>), the <S%G755>headwaiter<s%> <S%G5455>called<s%> the <S%G3566>bridegroom,<s%>

and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G3956>"Every<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G5087>serves<s%> the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%> <S%G4413>first,<s%> and <S%G3752>when<s%> [men] have <S%G3184>drunk<s%> <S%G3184>freely,<s%> [then] that which is <S%G1640>poorer;<s%> you have <S%G5083>kept<s%> the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G737>now.<s%>"

<S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G746>beginning<s%> of [His] <S%G4592>signs<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4160>did<s%> in <S%G2580>Cana<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> and <S%G5319>manifested<s%> His <S%G1391>glory,<s%> and His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> in Him.

<S%G3326>After<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> He <S%G2597>went<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> to <S%G2746>Capernaum,<s%> He and His <S%G3384>mother,<s%> and [His] <S%G80>brothers,<s%> and His <S%G3101>disciples;<s%> and <S%G1563>there<s%> they <S%G3306>stayed<s%> a <S%G3756>few<s%> <S%G4183><s%> <S%G2250>days.<s%>
And the <S%G3957>Passover<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> was at <S%G1451>hand,<s%> and <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G305>went<s%> up to <S%G2414>Jerusalem.<s%>

And He <S%G2147>found<s%> in the <S%G2413>temple<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G4453>selling<s%> <S%G1016>oxen<s%> and <S%G4263>sheep<s%> and <S%G4058>doves,<s%> and the <S%G2773>moneychangers<s%> <S%G2521>seated.<s%>

And He <S%G4160>made<s%> a <S%G5416>scourge<s%> of <S%G4979>cords,<s%> and <S%G1544>drove<s%> [them] <S%G3956>all<s%> out of the <S%G2413>temple,<s%> with the <S%G4263>sheep<s%> and the <S%G1016>oxen;<s%> and He <S%G1632>poured<s%> out the <S%G2772>coins<s%> of the <S%G2855>moneychangers,<s%> and <S%G396>overturned<s%> their <S%G5132>tables;<s%>

and to <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G4453>selling<s%> the <S%G4058>doves<s%> He <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G142>"Take<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> <S%G142>away;<s%> <S%G3361>stop<s%> <S%G4160>making<s%> My Father's <S%G3624>house<s%> a <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G1712>merchandise.<s%>"
His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3403>remembered<s%> that it was <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G2205>"Zeal<s%> for Thy <S%G3624>house<s%> will <S%G2719>consume<s%> me."

The <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G5101>"What<s%> <S%G4592>sign<s%> do You <S%G1166>show<s%> to us, seeing that You <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%>?"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G3089>"Destroy<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3485>temple,<s%> and in <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> I will <S%G1453>raise<s%> it up."

The <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> "It took forty-six <S%G2094>years<s%> to <S%G3618>build<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3485>temple,<s%> and will You <S%G1453>raise<s%> it up in <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%>?"
But He was <S%G3004>speaking<s%> of the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of His <S%G4983>body.<s%>

<S%G3753>When<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> He was <S%G1453>raised<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3403>remembered<s%> that He <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3778>this;<s%> and they <S%G4100>believed<s%> the <S%G1124>Scripture,<s%> and the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G3004>spoken.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> He was in <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> at the <S%G3957>Passover,<s%> <S%G1722>during<s%> the <S%G1859>feast,<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> in His <S%G3686>name,<s%> <S%G2334>beholding<s%> His <S%G4592>signs<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> He was <S%G4160>doing.<s%>
But <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> on His <S%G846>part,<s%> was not <S%G4100>entrusting<s%> <S%G846>Himself<s%> to them, for He <S%G1097>knew<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>men,<s%>

and <S%G3754>because<s%> He did not <S%G5532>need<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> to <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> for He <S%G846>Himself<s%> <S%G1097>knew<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> was in <S%G444>man.<s%>
